message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, see what happens next?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer
You said you deserved more, so I'm giving you a slightly better deal. Your turn to decide!
I'll give you a slightly worse deal this time, but I'm willing to compromise
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than 35/65. Meet me in the middle?
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it
I'm trying to hold on to what's left. Meet me at 36/64?
